00009 TextureMonitor::~TextureMonitor()

00011     printf("Destroying texture monitor\n");
00012 
00013     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_resourceList.size(); ++i)
00014     {

00030 void* TextureMonitor::f_loadEntity(std::string Name)
00031 {
00032     printf("Load entity called\n");
00033     Texture* newTexture = GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->newTexture();
00034 
00035     if (newTexture == 0)
00036     {
00037         char Buffer[512];
00038         sprintf(Buffer, "Unable to load texture %s due to being unable to create a Texture object\n", Name.c_str());
00039         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeData(Buffer);
00040         return 0;
00041     }
00042 
00043     FilesystemNode* node = Filesystem::evaluateChild(Filesystem::getRoot(), Name);
00044 
00045     if (node == 0)
00046     {
00047         char Buffer[512];
00048         sprintf(Buffer, "Unable to load texture %s due to being unable to find specified node in filesystem\n", Name.c_str());
00049         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeData(Buffer);
00050         return 0;
00051     }
00052 
00053     if (node->getType() != fileId)
00054     {
00055         char Buffer[512];
00056         sprintf(Buffer, "Unable to load texture %s due to node not being marked as a file in the filesystem\n", Name.c_str());
00057         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeData(Buffer);
00058         return 0;
00059     }
00060 
00061     File* castToFile = static_cast<File*> (node);
00062 
00063     DataInputStream* newStream = castToFile->createInputStream();
00064     newStream->open(false);
00065 
00066     if (m_Loader.load(newTexture, newStream) == false)
00067     {
00068 
00069         char Buffer[512];
00070         sprintf(Buffer, "Unable to load texture %s due to being unable to load from file path\n", Name.c_str());
00071         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeData(Buffer);
00072 
00073         delete newTexture;
00074 
00075         //Delete the input stream once its been used
00076         delete newStream;
00077 
00078         return 0;
00079     }
00080     else
00081     {
00082 
00083         char Buffer[512];
00084         sprintf(Buffer, "Succesfully loaded texture %s\n", Name.c_str());
00085         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getRenderLog()->writeData(Buffer);
00086 
00087         f_addEntity( Name, (void*) newTexture );
00088 
00089         //Delete the input stream once its been used
00090         delete newStream;
00091 
00092         return (void*)newTexture;
00093     }
00094 }

00096 Texture* TextureMonitor::getTexture(const char* Filename)
00097 {
00098     return (Texture*) rmGetResource(Filename);
00099 }

00101 void TextureMonitor::releaseTexture(Texture* Texture)
